oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Leroy Troy at the Tennessee Folklore Society's 50th anniversary
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Old-time banjo player Leroy Troy of Sumner Co., performs for the members of the Tennessee Folklore Society at the group's 50th anniversary celebration, Cookeville, 1984.
Troy is nationally known for his style of playing in the tradition of Uncle Dave Macon, an early star of WSM radio's Grand Ole Opry.
